steps.title: Cook Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook according to package instructions.
In the last 2-3 minutes of cooking, add the broccoli florets to the boiling water.
Drain and set aside, reserving some pasta water.

steps.title: Make the Sauce
instructions: In a blender, combine the cooked white beans, lemon juice, olive oil, nutritional yeast, onion powder, garlic powder, and vegetable broth.
If the sauce is too thick, add a bit more broth or some reserved pasta water to achieve your desired consistency.

steps.title: Combine and Serve
instructions: Return the cooked pasta and broccoli to the pot.
Pour over the creamy white bean sauce and heat over medium, stirring until everything is heated through and well coated.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions: Serve the pasta in bowls, sprinkled with toasted pine nuts.
